name: In-Dice
description:
In-Dice is an zelda like puzzle game made for the GMTK jam 2022 were you play a dice-dude resolving puzzles on ... a DICE ?!

  1. To win, you need to reach the exact SCORE as shown on the left bar. The dice indicates how much points you'll get if you clear the room.
  2. If you can't achive a room due to a bug, exit the room and go back.

Inputs :
- Arrow / WASD / ZQSD : move
- X / L / 2 : attack
